name: Matt McLellan
text:
Do NOT fly Frontier. They are refusing to credit back a COVID related cancellation even though I went through proper channels to try and cancel ahead of time.

All customer service #s were busy at the time and I could not get through to even hold for someone. They didn't even credit half of my flight cost back. Will never fly Frontier again and will recommend against any friends flying out of BNA or HSV to fly with literally anyone else! See the photo for proof.

You guys are a joke!

name: Lisa Ayres
text: Tiniest airport ever!! Staff was super friendly, easy to find, quick processing, etc.

name: Manuela Smith
text: Economical for a short trip without any luggage. Seats do not recline.

name: Derrick Mullins
text: Fast and great deal

name: Jeff LaFrance
text: Sad to see them go

name: Edward Longmire
text: I work there

name: Kristin Hansen
text: We had some issues with our flight being delayed and missing our connecting flight. However, Latoya was so amazing in helping us get our flight changed. After helping us non stop for about 30 minutes we finally got everything figured out! So thankful for her!! She was the absolute best!!!!

name: Todd Roseborough
text: This was the most terrible experience that I have had in my life I was delayed 6 different times over nine hrs late then when I was supposed to be in Huntsville al and now know one can find my luggage  this is crazy this was supposed to be a quick trip that turned into a nightmare.

name: Jazmine Herrera
text: Don’t show up before they open to get your tickets and check in at the kiosk. Everyone who showed up after they opened were able to check baggage printed out... so all of us in line first who already got tickets waited about an hour for everyone who was just now checking in at the kiosk because they had the option to get checked bags printed and the front desk kept calling out their names first while ignoring the entire line.

name: Nina Linke
text: Absolutely the WORST customer service I have ever experienced in my entire life!!! I got to the airport 40 minutes prior to departure due to a wreck on the road. The women at the desk said I was too late, even though there were literally no other customers waiting in line to check in or at the security checkpoint. The plane still had 30 minutes until departure and it would have taken me less than 10 minutes to get through security and on the plane. They would not help me to get to the plane as quick as possible and they did not try to help at all! I will never fly with American Airlines again!

name: Michael Gross
text: Very Rude people working for American Airlines.  I called the American Airline number and the male person with a non english accent answered the phone and basically told me i needed to call the airline and hung up on me.  He didn't even offer to provide me the correct number to call.  I am trying to track down my lost luggage that American decided not to put on the rebooked flight because they Cancelled all flights in Texas.  I would recommend avoiding American Airlines if you want a stress free travel experience.

name: Brittany Terry
text: Very friendly crew, especially with everything that’s going on in the world right now. I was having to travel to go to my Grandpa’s funeral, and they made sure I was taken care of and okay throughout my flight.

name: micah griffin
text:
I want to ensure no one experiences what I did at Huntsville, Alabama ticket counter. AA employee Kathy Eldridge was very disrespectful and displayed poor customer service when she called the police on me for simply voicing my concerns about a technical issues caused by AA.

I was treated like a criminal and racially profiled by this employee for trying to book a flight using a voucher. My black skin was treated as a threat and instead of Kathy using customer relations skills to resolve the issue she opted to get the police involved.

The unfortunate reality is we see this everyday with white people using the police at thier disposal to intimate and display white privilege over black citizens.

name: Jason M
text: Four hour delays, and lost both my bags are any airlines worth the price they charge for tickets. I'd rather drive if only I had the time. We need a rail system so there is a choice of travel. No competition they'll never get better.

name: D LAMBERT
text: Smooth trip. Wheels up to Wheels down

name: William Fold
text: Scam ticket outfit, don't bother calling.

name: rolltidebama32
text: Lost my luggage

name: James Tait
text: Very rude and unprofessional, never will use again

name: Tracy Matalik
text: Excellent

name: Laura Lindsey
text: Excellent flight!!!!
